attributes.action: make the class 185 the new royal train
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The royal family need a new train and I think based on the awesomeness of the Transpennine class 185 Desiro's that one of these units should be designated the new royal train. I nominate 185132 for the mission

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
